hibernate-mapping.query: from Person where account = ? and password = ?
from Article where time like ? and cast(pass as string) = ? and cast(type as string) = ? Order by uptime desc
from Product as p where p.state = 1 and p.pass = 1 and p.person.person_id = ?
from Product as p where p.state != 1 and p.pass = 1 and p.person.person_id = ?
from Auth as a where a.role.role_id = ?
